Learning and Forgetting in Neural Networks.
NEW

This was a semester long project with CKIDS, USC on understanding unlearning mechanisms in Neural Networks and client drift in Non-IID Federated Learning setting.

Own your terms

Chrome extension that instantly detects potential red flags in any document, such as a rental lease, terms and conditions, when signing them in any website. Secured 3rd Place at USC Viterbi Hacks for best social impact and UI design.

Android based companion app to control IoT devices in SmartHome.
